actions.text: Amendment (A011) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment provides and additional $10 million (by offset) for Defense Health Program's research and development to address breast cancer in the United States military.
purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 113-170 to increase the Defense Health Program's Research and Development account by $10 million and reduces the Defense Procurement-Wide account by the same amount.
